body_html:
Err tf.contrib.stateless
…
On Sat, Jul 28, 2018, 5:43 PM Eugene Brevdo ***@***.***> wrote: I think this is a case where you'd want to use tf.config.stateless random samplers. We may want to add that to the map* docstrings. +Derek Murray ***@***.***> wdyt? Is this a bug or should we be able to guarantee e.g. number of times that a map fn is called and the state of the rng seed across the multiple calls? On Sat, Jul 28, 2018, 11:49 AM Alfred Sorten Wolf < ***@***.***> wrote: > Please remove the assignee, as this issue is inviting external > contributions. Otherwise, remove the contributions welcome label. Thank > you. > > — > You are receiving this because you were assigned. > Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub > <#17859 (comment)>, > or mute the thread > <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABtimwmTme8FUWk-ToMrV05wFSk-7ZgHks5uLLI0gaJpZM4Sxvsj> > . >
body_text:
Err tf.contrib.stateless
…
On Sat, Jul 28, 2018, 5:43 PM Eugene Brevdo ***@***.***> wrote:
 I think this is a case where you'd want to use tf.config.stateless random
 samplers. We may want to add that to the map* docstrings.  +Derek Murray
 ***@***.***> wdyt?  Is this a bug or should we be able to guarantee
 e.g. number of times that a map fn is called and the state of the rng seed
 across the multiple calls?

 On Sat, Jul 28, 2018, 11:49 AM Alfred Sorten Wolf <
 ***@***.***> wrote:

> Please remove the assignee, as this issue is inviting external
> contributions. Otherwise, remove the contributions welcome label. Thank
> you.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were assigned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <#17859 (comment)>,
> or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABtimwmTme8FUWk-ToMrV05wFSk-7ZgHks5uLLI0gaJpZM4Sxvsj>

body:
Err tf.contrib.stateless

On Sat, Jul 28, 2018, 5:43 PM Eugene Brevdo <ebrevdo@google.com> wrote:

> I think this is a case where you'd want to use tf.config.stateless random
> samplers. We may want to add that to the map* docstrings.  +Derek Murray
> <mrry@google.com> wdyt?  Is this a bug or should we be able to guarantee
> e.g. number of times that a map fn is called and the state of the rng seed
> across the multiple calls?
>
> On Sat, Jul 28, 2018, 11:49 AM Alfred Sorten Wolf <
> notifications@github.com> wrote:
>
>> Please remove the assignee, as this issue is inviting external
>> contributions. Otherwise, remove the contributions welcome label. Thank
>> you.
>>
>> —
>> You are receiving this because you were assigned.
>> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
>> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/17859#issuecomment-408627716>,
>> or mute the thread
>> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABtimwmTme8FUWk-ToMrV05wFSk-7ZgHks5uLLI0gaJpZM4Sxvsj>
>> .
>>
>
